Sentencas: A two-layer rechargeable oxide battery using a stack initially developed for solid oxide cells was operated for 2100 h with more than 1000 charging/discharging cycles.
Titulo: Multiple charging/discharging cycles of a rechargeable oxide battery - Electrochemistry and post-test analysis

Sentencas: The operation temperature was 800 degrees C and the applied current density (on the solid oxide cell) was 150 mA cm(-2).
Titulo: Multiple charging/discharging cycles of a rechargeable oxide battery - Electrochemistry and post-test analysis

Sentencas: During operation, no electrochemical indications for degradation were measured.
Titulo: Multiple charging/discharging cycles of a rechargeable oxide battery - Electrochemistry and post-test analysis

Sentencas: The voltages achieved during redox cycling were in good agreement with the equilibrium voltages of the envisaged corresponding phases.
Titulo: Multiple charging/discharging cycles of a rechargeable oxide battery - Electrochemistry and post-test analysis

Sentencas: For the first time, a storage material based on the calcium-iron oxide with the richest iron content was used.
Titulo: Multiple charging/discharging cycles of a rechargeable oxide battery - Electrochemistry and post-test analysis

Sentencas: Storage utilization was 86%, thereby reaching a capacity of 20.6 Ah per layer.
Titulo: Multiple charging/discharging cycles of a rechargeable oxide battery - Electrochemistry and post-test analysis

Sentencas: Post-test analysis of the storage revealed mostly expected storage phases and sufficient remaining storage porosity.
Titulo: Multiple charging/discharging cycles of a rechargeable oxide battery - Electrochemistry and post-test analysis
